scripts.before_install: npm config set chromedriver_skip_download=true && npm install chromedriver@latest --chromedriver_skip_download=true
scripts.test:authenticator:staticLogin: npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin:custom && npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin:customViaConfig && npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin:fiori && npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin:plain && npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin:sapCloud
scripts.test:authenticator:systemLogin: npm run test:authenticator:systemLogin:custom && npm run test:authenticator:systemLogin:fiori && npm run test:authenticator:systemLogin:plain && npm run test:authenticator:systemLogin:sapCloud
scripts.test:authenticator: npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin && npm run test:authenticator:systemLogin
scripts.test:core:dataExchange: npm run test:core:dataExchange:export && npm run test:core:dataExchange:import && npm run test:core:dataExchange:standard && npm run test:core:dataExchange:parallel && npm run test:core:dataExchange:parallelGroup
scripts.test:core:functional: npm run test:core:functional:chaining && npm run test:core:functional:locator && npm run test:core:functional:nativeBrowser && npm run test:core:functional:nonUi5 && npm run test:core:functional:ui5Properties && npm run test:core:functional:uiveri5
scripts.test:core:testIntegration: npm run test:core:testIntegration:standard && npm run test:core:testIntegration:multiCombo && npm run test:core:testIntegration:table
scripts.test:core: npm run test:core:functional && npm run test:core:dataExchange && npm run test:core:testIntegration
scripts.test:reuse:nonUi5: npm run test:reuse:nonUi5:userInteraction && npm run test:reuse:nonUi5:assertion && npm run test:reuse:nonUi5:element
scripts.test:reuse:ui5: npm run test:reuse:ui5:assertion && npm run test:reuse:ui5:confirmationDialog && npm run test:reuse:ui5:control && npm run test:reuse:ui5:date && npm run test:reuse:ui5:element && npm run test:reuse:ui5:errorDialog && npm run test:reuse:ui5:navigation && npm run test:reuse:ui5:userInteraction && npm run test:reuse:ui5:errorDialog && npm run test:reuse:ui5:navigation
scripts.test:reuse:ui5:pt1: npm run test:reuse:ui5:assertion && npm run test:reuse:ui5:confirmationDialog && npm run test:reuse:ui5:control && npm run test:reuse:ui5:date && npm run test:reuse:ui5:element
scripts.test:reuse:ui5:pt2: npm run test:reuse:ui5:errorDialog && npm run test:reuse:ui5:navigation && npm run test:reuse:ui5:userInteraction
scripts.test:reuse:util: npm run test:reuse:util:browser && npm run test:reuse:util:file && npm run test:reuse:util:formatter
scripts.test:reuse:common: npm run test:reuse:common:assertion && npm run test:reuse:common:navigation && npm run test:reuse:common:date && npm run test:reuse:common:userInteraction
scripts.test:legacyReuse:nonUi5: npm run test:legacyReuse:nonUi5:assertion && npm run test:legacyReuse:nonUi5:locator && npm run test:legacyReuse:nonUi5:navigation && npm run test:legacyReuse:nonUi5:userInteraction
scripts.test:legacyReuse:ui5: npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:assertion && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:client && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:confirmationDialog && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:date && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:errorDialog && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:formatter && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:locator && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:navigation && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:navigationBar && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:session && npm run test:legacyReuse:ui5:userInteraction
scripts.test:legacyReuse:utilities: npm run test:legacyReuse:utilities:browser && npm run test:legacyReuse:utilities:dialogInteraction && npm run test:legacyReuse:utilities:formatter
scripts.test:reuse: npm run test:reuse:common && npm run test:reuse:nonUi5 && npm run test:reuse:ui5 && npm run test:reuse:util
scripts.test: npm run test:authenticator:staticLogin && npm run test:core && npm run test:reuse
